# Development Summaries

This directory contains development progress summaries, completion reports, and status updates from the hyper2kvm project development.

## Contents

### Test Coverage & Completion
- **TEST_COVERAGE_FINAL.md** - Final test coverage report
- **TESTS_COMPLETE_SUMMARY.md** - Complete test suite summary
- **TEST_ADDITIONS_SUMMARY.md** - Summary of test additions
- **FINAL_TEST_SUMMARY.md** - Final testing summary

### Feature Development
- **BATCH_MIGRATION_PROGRESS.md** - Batch migration feature progress
- **BATCH_MIGRATION_SUMMARY.md** - Batch migration completion summary
- **TUI_SUMMARY.md** - TUI (Text UI) implementation summary
- **SHELL_COMPLETION_SUMMARY.md** - Shell completion feature summary

### Bug Fixes & Reviews
- **CRITICAL_FIXES.md** - Critical bug fixes applied
- **DEEP_ANALYSIS_FIXES.md** - Deep analysis and fixes
- **REVIEW_FIXES.md** - Code review fixes
- **IMMEDIATE_WINS_SUMMARY.md** - Quick wins and improvements

### Project Completion
- **COMPLETE_SUMMARY.md** - Overall project completion summary
- **FINAL_REVIEW.md** - Final project review
- **CI_COMPLETION_TESTING.md** - CI/CD completion and testing

### Organization
- **ORGANIZATION_SUMMARY.md** - Documentation organization summary
- **DOCS_ORGANIZATION_COMPLETE.md** - Documentation organization completion

## Purpose

These summaries document the development journey of hyper2kvm and serve as:
- Historical record of development milestones
- Reference for completed features and fixes
- Documentation of testing and quality assurance efforts
- Project management and tracking artifacts

## Note

These are historical development documents. For current project status, see:
- [../PROJECT_STATUS.md](../../project/PROJECT_STATUS.md) - Current project status
- [../Priority-1-Features.md](../../project/Priority-1-Features.md) - Current priorities and roadmap
